message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me to consider.  This product offers substantial value, and I believe a price closer to $13,500 is more reflective of that. Would you be open to discussing that figure?

I understand the product's value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $13,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
